modName: Revert USLEEP Fix - Fortify Marksman (Fortify Archery Alchemy Effect)
summary: This mod simply undoes the USLEEP fix to the Fortify Marksman alchemy effect, allowing Fortify Archery potions to augment all physical damage as they do in the latest official patch.
descriptionHtml:
This mod reverses the USLEEP fix to the Fortify Marksman (Archery) alchemy effect. In the last official patch (and all prior versions), this effect actually buffs all outgoing physical damage. USLEEP corrects this to only buff outgoing damage with bows. With this mod, you can use USLEEP and still have Fortify Marksman potions augment all physical damage once again!

I made this mod to be used with the latest version of USLEEP, though it should work fine with older versions, future versions, and even the old USKP. Place this .esp after USLEEP in your load order! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Download USLEEP here[/url].

You may also be interested in:

[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34302/?]Revert Fortify Restoration Fix[/url] (by Belthazor82)

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33748/?]Revert Aspect of Terror Change[/url] (by DampNinja117)

[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28781/?]Necromage Counter Fix[/url] (by TheHorsemen) -OR-Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29474/?]Revert Necromage Change[/url] (by DampNinja117)

[/list]
I also recommend merging these all together using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69905/?]Merge Plugins[/url] (by matortheeternal).
author: Teccam
